text: haey yeung ban phdal braphnaul towkean mdeay mou sa tha chaur anak bambaw ke choh . te brasenbae anak pruoybaromph champoh ke( mou sa) chaur anak dak bandet ke tam t ne l( ni l)choh haey chaur anak kom phyokhlach ning kom pruoybaromph aoy saoh . pitabrakd nasa yeung nung tralb ke aoy anak vinh haey yeung nung tengtang ke chea anakneasar muoy roub knongchamnaom anakneasar teanglay robsa yeung
